name: acos5_64_gui
description: Administration tool for ACOS5-64, based on driver acos5_64
systemDependencies: IUP-Portable User Interface shared libraries installed, opensc installation v.0.17.0, libacos5_64.so (binary from this package's opensc_0.*/ +libphobos2.so.0.80 from a DMD installation) located in a common .so look-up path, opensc.conf configured appropriately; (not yet required: for gettext the exports available from libintl.so or ?)
